name: paneling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
flat, usually rectangular parts, or pieces of wood, metal, cloth, etc., that fit into or onto something larger: wood paneling The house has original Georgian paneling. See
panel
More examplesFewer examplesThe rooms feature delicately carved wall paneling.The walls were lined with light oak paneling.The room had an enormous fireplace with marble paneling.
